Extended Example

This example shows:

  • setting additional defaults at runtime

  • setting default functions

  • defining additional custom config types

  • defining a post-processing pipeline

  • adding custom config values at runtime

Prepare the two needed configuration definition files to run this example:

  • “example_2_intermediate.yaml” (See the Intermediate Example section)

  • “example_4_extended.yaml” (See the Extended Example section)

Run the following code example:

 1from mgconfig import Configuration, DefaultValues, PostProcessing, DefaultFunctions, ConfigTypes, prepare_temp_data_directory
 2from ext_default_functions import default_hostname, default_timezone
 3from ext_postprocessing import extend_timezone_configuration, LOCAL_TZ_ID
 4from ext_config_types import parse_filename
 5
 6# this function create a new and empty data directory for testing purposes
 7prepare_temp_data_directory(__file__)
 8
 9
10CONFIG_DEFINITIONS_YAML = [
11    "config_defs/config_def_2_intermediate.yaml",
12    "config_defs/config_def_4_extended.yaml"
13]
14
15
16# # ---------------------------------------------------------------------
17# # configuration types extension - examples
18# # ---------------------------------------------------------------------
19ConfigTypes.add_type('minutes', int,
20                     ConfigTypes._parse_int_positive, str, None)
21ConfigTypes.add_type('seconds', int,
22                     ConfigTypes._parse_int_positive, str, None)
23ConfigTypes.add_type('filename', str, parse_filename, None, None)
24
25
26# # ---------------------------------------------------------------------
27# # default values - example
28# # ---------------------------------------------------------------------
29DefaultValues().clear()
30DefaultValues().add('app_name', 'Application_Name')
31
32# # ---------------------------------------------------------------------
33# # default functions - example
34# # ---------------------------------------------------------------------
35DefaultFunctions().add('hostname', default_hostname)
36DefaultFunctions().add('timezone', default_timezone)
37
38# # ---------------------------------------------------------------------
39# # post-processing - example
40# # ---------------------------------------------------------------------
41PostProcessing().add(extend_timezone_configuration)
42
43# ---------------------------------------------------------------------
44# configuration instance creation
45# ---------------------------------------------------------------------
46config = Configuration(CONFIG_DEFINITIONS_YAML)
47
48# ---------------------------------------------------------------------
49# checking specific post-processing results
50# ---------------------------------------------------------------------
51if LOCAL_TZ_ID in config:
52    print(
53        f'Local timezone: {config.get_value(LOCAL_TZ_ID).zone}')
54    # value of 'local_tz' can be directly accessed as property using config.extended.local_tz
55else:
56    print(
57        f'Configuration value for "{LOCAL_TZ_ID}" was not found.')
58
59print(ConfigTypes.list_all())
